attributes.action: Scrap the so called green travel tax on flights from the U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The green travel tax of £40 international flights and £10 domestic flights,is unfair and will not do anything to reduce travel,just another tax by this government,flights already have a huge proportion of tax,and this one is unfair and possibly illegal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
